info: Regency Trust wins the United Kingdom's Innovative Bank of the Month consecutively for the month of October, 2025.
We have taken steps to update our servers with the latest securities patches to protect our customers from AI related cyber attachs.
Interest rate for existing/performing loans has been reduced by up to 50 bases points, to enable small/medium/large businesses achieve their annual growth target for this last quarter.

Inline with our drive for a better Online Banking experience for our customers across the globe, our Customer Care unit are available 247 via our dedicated lines to serve you better. Thanks for banking with us.
